Text:
Thank you very, very must for posting these shows as well as to others who posted them also.
 I've had 14 surgery's on my leg and ankle and a few more to go , these shows very much help pass time for me... and my MP3 player's are always full.  My CO and other NCO's are downloading them all too.
Again Thanks GOD BLESS THE USA.................WHOOOOAAAHHHH!!!!!!!
